examples: He's studying music in his spare time.
Estudia música en su tiempo libre.
I haven't had a spare moment this morning.
No he tenido un momento libre esta mañana.
We've got a spare bedroom, if you'd like to stay.
Tenemos un dormitorio libre, si quiere quedarse.
I'm afraid I haven't got any spare cash.
Me temo que no tengo dinero extra.
